entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow late in the morning and ending in the afternoon then partly cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 06 January 2023
